title: iPhone 15 - Two weeks later!

The thing that I noticed the most, is how fast it is. Granted, I did only upgrade from the iPhone 14, but immediately I noticed just swiping through, opening apps, everything just felt faster. And even in past iPhone upgrades, I don't really remember having that feeling. So I'm not sure what's going on here with the A17 Pro, but it does feel noticeably faster. The other thing that I was quite surprised about, is I don't really think they did any huge upgrades to the front facing camera, but it feels like they did. Now, I take a lot of photos sitting here at this desk, and for whatever reason, sometimes the photos don't really look that great, especially using the front facing camera. But these pictures that I took of me and Maddie, like they just looked so crisp. The lighting was very even. I don't know if it's some sort of new algorithm or something, it feels much better.
